Title: Prohibits the state from purchasing any product that was made with child labor
Summary: Prohibits the state from purchasing any product that was made with child labor or which contains components or parts manufactured or procured using child labor.
LawCode: Amd ยง165, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the state from purchasing any product that was made with child labor
